title: Tara Brown's killer sentenced to life | Stuff.co.nz
text:
Tara Brown's killer sentenced to life Last updated 18:02, February 27 2017 FACEBOOK 
Lionel Patea and Tara Brown were previously in a relationship, and had a daughter together. 
Lionel Patea has been jailed for life after pleading guilty to the murder of his former partner, New Zealand-born Tara Brown on Australia's Gold Cost, on the first day of his trial. 
Patea bludgeoned Brown, 24, to death with a metal fire hydrant cover after he ran her car off a suburban street in September 2015. 
He had been expected to stand trial for one week in the Brisbane Supreme Court but changed his plea on Monday. 
The court was standing room only with dozens of Brown's family and friends spilling out of the public gallery. 
More to come.
